reviews.review: 结束既是开始 9/10
One of the most funny and original games you will ever play.
This is probably the best campaign game that I have played in a while.

В плане сюжета игра наискучнейшая до мозга костей. Никаких интересных поворотных сюжетов, никаких хороших диалогов, и даже никакого времени ибо игра проходится за 5 часов максимум, если вы конечно не человек с умственными отклонениями,ибо даже такой долбаеб как я прошел ее за 4 с хером часа. В этой игре ты просто бежишь и тпшаешься, все. Игра мне показалась недоработанной в плане как сюжета так и заданий ибо при прохождении игры мне казалось что чего то не хватало. Возможно Гейб сделал эту игру на скорую руку и не запаривался с сюжетом ибо в том же году как вышла эта игра, вышла еще Half-Life 2: Episode Two чему он придавал больше времени и затрат на создание сюжета чем Порталу. 
Игра 6/10 ибо сюжет сделан на скорую руку, и хороших моментов в ней только середина и конец игры. Из хороших моментов более сложные испытания чем во второй части (Да, я мазохист) и можно поднапрячь тем самым мозг и отвлечься от скучного сюжета.
Brilliant game, a puzzle solver with a bit of adrenaline.

[h1][b]My Favorite Game Franchise Ever[/b][/h1]
Portal is a game that introduces an amazing new perspectives on gaming mechanics by using, well... portals to complete each test chamber level. You are awoken by the voice of GLaDOS which is the only other person that seems to be in their entire facility but find out later that others came before you. The writing and story of the game is also very good, it has bits of comedic genius everywhere which brightens up the mood of the place which is mostly bland, and dull white walls and floors. Portal is a great game and I bet you will love it too.
it is a game

Almost gave me an heart attack..
When that portal challenge achievement didn't register I almost felt so hopeless.
Least steps in chamber 18 is so hard AF after a lot of tries i managed to clear it on gold.

and the ingame achievement showed up as 100% done while the steam achievement didnt pop up.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=419856706#:~:text=If%20an%20achievement%20does%20NOT,time%20during%20your%20play%20session.

I followed the guide above and renamed the gamestate file and tried chamber 14 after which i got the achievement.

Anyway there's no doubt that this game is a heavy recommend.

Portal is a very straightforward and minimalist feeling game that also contains creative gameplay mechanics and an enriching atmosphere. Almost anyone can pick up this game and be able to have a good time with it. While the narrative is very bare bones in nature, there are interesting pieces of information given through both the cleverly written dialogue and within the actual levels themselves. I was initially shocked by how short the main game is, but there is some replayability offered from Portal's achievements and challenge maps.

2007 yapımı olan bir oyun için gayet yeterli bir grafiği var. Eğer benim gibi grafiğe o kadar da önem vermiyorsanız bence alın hikayesi gayet zevklii ama şu yıllarda zevk vermeyebilir ama eğer o zamanlarda oynansaydı gayet iyi olurdu bence kısaca alın yani arkadaş ortamında sorarlarsa söylemek zevkli olur bir de oyun iyice eskimeden oynayın ki tadını daha iyi alasınız.
This is not a long game, but it is worth every penny. The game is composed of levels, each of which is a puzzle that requires using the portals in ever more complicated ways. Also, there is cake.

Bu oyun beyin gerektiren bir oyun. Yani bulmaca türevi şeyleri seviyorsanız hemen alın derim. Ayrıca indirimlerde 2-3TL gibi komik bir fiyata inmekte. Oyun kısa, ama bulmacaları çözmek uzunca zamanınızı alıyor. 4 saat oynayış sürem var. Siz ona aldanmayın. Ben oyunu açık bıraktığımdan dolayı bu kadar çok sürem var. Ortalama 1.5-2 saate biter oyun. Bir de söylemeden geçmeyeyim, bu oyun Source motorunun aşırı güçlü bir motor olduğunu ispatlamıştır. 
Alın, aldırın, aldırtırın; oynayın, oynatın, oynattırın!

Despite being made in 2010, this game is fantastic!  Having picked up this game and its successor, Portal 2, on sale for only 90 Yen (about $1) I am totally satisfied.  The only complaint I would make is that this game has two jumping puzzles that, unless you use a controller, are quite difficult to do.  Other than that, just an amazing, mind blowing experience!
